name: Starlight Overdrive
description:
Starlight Overdrive is a Tough-as-Nails Retro-Inspired Bullet-Hell game.

The game is deliberately made to look like a modernized arcade game. (Likewise, it can be controlled using a joystick and 4 buttons if the player desires; just like actual retro/arcade games!)

Players have the option to input a cheat before starting the game that alters their in-game capabilities. Enemies spawn in waves after waves to attempt to take down the player. 

Players also have a variety of weapons in their arsenal to help take down enemies.

Screenshots:

 Title Screen
Display of Gameplay Screen
Player Death Screen Shows Player Weapons Player Controls

Difficulty increases over time (if you manage to stay alive for a long time)!

Good luck and Game on!
